attributes.action: change the marriage law on handfasting
attributes.background: i would like the government to change the law in this country to enable other religous groups ie pagan and many other religions to get married in there ancestral beliefs and traditions and is in no way inclusive to all religious beliefs and faiths such as a pagan handfasting.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead: 

Grant English and Welsh Pagans the same marriage rights as Scottish Pagans: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329249
